Name: Fly Like a Butterfly
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This light, aromatic, sweet and sour beauty has a grown-up, quinine-rich flavour but lacks the 'sting like a bee' finish.
History: Created by yours truly, this is my take on a classic cocktail called a 'Lovely Butterfly' made with the same ingredients.
Nutrition: One serving of Fly Like a Butterfly contains 100 calories
